name: putridly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to emphasize that something is very bad: Why did they choose this putridly ugly man to play the hero? It was putridly hot, with 79% humidity.
More examplesFewer examplesHe always tells the players how great they really are, despite how incredibly putridly they played. When talking about the weather in his hometown in California, he describes the summers as not simply hot, but putridly hot. I can't believe they still give this putridly ugly actor work.The river was full of dead fish and stank putridly.
